entry.title: Laude family thought Duterte an ‘ally’—until Pemberton pardon: lawyer

media:group.media:title: Laude family thought Duterte an ‘ally’—until Pemberton pardon: lawyer
media:group.media:description: The family of slain transgender Jennifer Laude had thought of President Rodrigo Duterte as an “ally”—until he pardoned the US soldier convicted in her killing, their lawyer said Tuesday.

entry.title: Govt urged to allow public participation during budget preparation

media:group.media:title: Govt urged to allow public participation during budget preparation
media:group.media:description: Government must allow the public to participate in budget deliberation during the preparation of its proposal and not during its legislation, a group said Tuesday.

entry.title: DOLE out of funds to help formal workers weather pandemic

media:group.media:title: DOLE out of funds to help formal workers weather pandemic
media:group.media:description: Labor Secretary Silvestre Bello III said Tuesday his agency only had funds to help informal workers cope with the coronavirus pandemic, and none for formal workers.

media:group.media:title: Lingkod Kapamilya | Teleradyo (8 September 2020)
media:group.media:description:

entry.title: Pemberton pardon within Duterte's prerogative under Constitution: justice official

media:group.media:title: Pemberton pardon within Duterte's prerogative under Constitution: justice official
media:group.media:description: MANILA - The Department of Justice (DOJ) on Tuesday said the grant of absolute pardon on US Marine Corporal Joseph Scott Pemberton did not go through the usual process.

entry.title: Bakit umaalis ang mga nurse natin sa Pilipinas?

media:group.media:title: Bakit umaalis ang mga nurse natin sa Pilipinas?
media:group.media:description:
Base sa isang pag-aaral, Pilipinas ang may pinakamababang pasahod sa mga nurse kung ikukumpara sa mga ibang bansa sa Southeast Asia.

entry.title: 'Sheer immorality': Duterte pardon of US Marine tied to foreign policy, says Laude camp

media:group.media:title: 'Sheer immorality': Duterte pardon of US Marine tied to foreign policy, says Laude camp
media:group.media:description: President Rodrigo Duterte's absolute pardon of convicted killer US Marine Joseph Scott Pemberton is "sheer immorality and totally unjust," a lawyer for the victim's family said Tuesday.

entry.title: 'Not proper' to replace Health chief during pandemic, DOH insists

media:group.media:title: 'Not proper' to replace Health chief during pandemic, DOH insists
media:group.media:description: The Department of Health said Tuesday it would not be "proper" to replace its chief as the country battled the COVID-19 pandemic.

entry.title: Labor chief wants more nurses exempted from overseas ban

media:group.media:title: Labor chief wants more nurses exempted from overseas ban
media:group.media:description: Labor Secretary Silvestre Bello III said Tuesday he wants more nurses to be exempted from an overseas deployment ban meant to ensure that the Philippines would have enough medical workers during the coronavirus pandemic.

entry.title: Pemberton hopes to go back to school after Duterte pardon: lawyer

media:group.media:title: Pemberton hopes to go back to school after Duterte pardon: lawyer
media:group.media:description: MANILA — US Marine Joseph Scott Pemberton is hoping to go back to school after receiving a pardon from President Rodrigo Duterte for killing a Filipina transgender, his lawyer said Tuesday.

entry.title: DOH says 'cannot confirm yet' flattening of COVID-19 curve

media:group.media:title: DOH says 'cannot confirm yet' flattening of COVID-19 curve
media:group.media:description: The Department of Health cannot yet confirm that the Philippines has flattened its COVID-19 pandemic curve, an official said Tuesday.

entry.title: OFW sa Lebanon, humingi ng tulong makauwi sa Pilipinas

media:group.media:title: OFW sa Lebanon, humingi ng tulong makauwi sa Pilipinas
media:group.media:description: MAYNILA - Humingi ng tulong ang isang Filipino domestic worker na nakabase sa Lebanon na makasama sa susunod na batch ng mga uuwing overseas Filipino workers sa Pilipinas.
